superfloppy.title: Unlocked Mode
superfloppy.desc: CPU and GPU clock tweaks for FloppyKernel.

1.label: Enabled (Overclock)
1.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.496 GHz (OC), GPU = 1.209 GHz (OC), UV disabled.

2.label: MegaFloppy (Overclock, risky)
2.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.6 GHz (OC), GPU = 1.209 GHz (OC), UV disabled.

3.label: UltraFloppy (Overclock, risky)
3.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.704 GHz (OC), GPU = 1.209 GHz (OC), UV disabled.

4.label: CoolFloppy (Underclock)
4.desc: CL0 = 2.0 GHz (stock), CL1 = 2.112 GHz (UC), GPU = 897 MHz (stock), UV enabled.

5.label: BalancedFloppy (Overclock)
5.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.4 GHz (stock), GPU = 897 MHz (stock), UV disabled.

force_perm.title: Force Permissive
force_perm.desc: Force SELinux Permissive mode. For developers.

ems_efficient.title: EMS Efficient Mode
ems_efficient.desc: Enable EMS efficient scheduler mode. Reduces performance and improves battery.

no_init_protection.title: Kill Init Protection
no_init_protection.desc: Allow Power HALs and init scripts to modify kernel knobs. Enable if you want the ROM to control performance.

legacy_timestamp_source.title: Legacy Timestamp
legacy_timestamp_source.desc: Fixes video recording length issues on ROMs with legacy camera HALs.

no_msm_perf_boost.title: Disable MSM Boost
no_msm_perf_boost.desc: Prevent MSM Performance from overwriting CPU min/max frequencies. May reduce responsiveness.

warm_reboot.title: Force Warm Reboot
warm_reboot.desc: Preserve RAM on reboot to gather logs easier. Recommended only for debugging, can cause broken WiFi.

uname_bpf_spoof.title: BPF Spoofing
uname_bpf_spoof.desc: Spoof Linux version for BPF support. Managed externally; changing this manually may cause bootloops.
